attributes.action: Stop Brexit before it's too late!
attributes.additional_details: To help the thousands of people who will suffer as a result of the UK withdrawal.  People who have made Europe their home face monumental issues with paperwork and added expense. Whilst people in the UK will suffer added anxieties through poor trade agreements and potential food supply shortages.
attributes.background: Cancel Brexit because clearly the government has been unsuccessful in negotiations and the UK will not be better off if they leave the EU.

rejection.details:
The UK has already left the EU, but you might like to sign the following petitions calling for related actions:

To Seek a 1 year Extension to the Brexit Transition Period & a Second Referendum: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554492

Rule out ending the transition period without a deal: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329500

The UK government should apply via Article 49 to rejoin the EU: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552263
